abstract: Advocates for same-sex marriage and their lawyers have prepared for months for oral arguments at Supreme Court in hopes of convincing justices to issue broad ruling on constitutionality of same-sex marriage; court has allotted time for debate on questions of whether states are required to allow such marriages and whether states are required to recognize same-sex marriages performed elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: Those arguing against states’ bans on same-sex marriage hope the justices will reach a bold verdict that would transform the status of gay Americans.

headline.main: Lawyers Seek Sea Change on Gay Rights at Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: Advocates Seek Sweeping Ruling in Marriage Case
